name: Dailypoems
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily poems
des: Get your daily dose of poetry - thought provoking, electrifying, human. Coffee for the soul is what it is. Simply say "Alexa, play daily poems", let the words in and expand your horizon. Thanks to the Poetry Foundation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
